thread.title: The University of Mobile men's soccer team beat No. 19 Dalton State 1-0 | AL.com
thread.title_full: The University of Mobile men's soccer team beat No. 19 Dalton State 1-0 | AL.com

author: UMobile Athletics
title: The University of Mobile men's soccer team beat No. 19 Dalton State 1-0 | AL.com
text:
Pierre Mangold's goal just 48 seconds into the game proved to be the difference as the University of Mobile men's soccer team went on the road to knock off 19 th -ranked Dalton State in Southern States Athletic Conference action Thursday evening.
Scoring Summary
00:48 – Mobile – Pierre Mangold (unassisted)
Numbers Game
3 – Elijah Gibson made 3 tops in the shutout effort, with all 3 coming in the second half
5 – Mobile won 5 corner kicks, compared to 2 for the home team
6 – Mobile held a 6-3 edge in shots on frame, with Newton Henry putting 4-of-5 on target
8 – Dalton State out-shot Mobile 8-7
Additional Notes
Mangold now has five goals on the season, which is good for second on the team Gibson delivered his third shutout of the year Mobile scored with one second left in regulation Saturday to get a tie, and scores 48 seconds into tonight's contest Rams are unbeaten in conference play with a win and two ties What's Next?
Mobile (7-4-2, 1-0-2) will host 22 nd -ranked Auburn University-Montgomery Thursday, Oct. 15 at 7:30 p.m.
